pullrequest.title: [Proposal] Remove URI scheme when matching SDF_PATH

content.raw: What's the use case for this? My only concern with this is that it adds to the complexity of libsdformat's path resolution process making it harder to understand and document. FYI, [here's](http://sdformat.org/tutorials?tut=composition&cat=specification&branch=model_comp_legacy#including-a-model) a list of the current steps.
content.html: What's the use case for this? My only concern with this is that it adds to the complexity of libsdformat's path resolution process making it harder to understand and document. FYI, here's a list of the current steps.
